title: Rice Finds 'Purrfect' Angle To Recruit High School QB
teaser: A recruiting letter was catnip to a high school football star in Texas. J.T. Granato said yes to Rice University after getting a pitch in the mail. It was addressed to Granato's beloved cat.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
